thread.title: Open house prank at 'Paranormal Activity' house
thread.title_full: Open house prank at 'Paranormal Activity' house - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Open house prank at 'Paranormal Activity' house
text:
Paramount Pictures International/YouTube Paramount created a haunted house to promote the new "Paranormal Activity" film They won't be buying this house anytime soon.
A video by Paramount Pictures to promote the next entry in the "Paranormal Activity" franchise features an open house at the scene of the original film in the series.
Unsuspecting house hunters come in and as they're making their way around the house some spooky things start happening. Lamps move with no cause, paintings fall off the walls, and scariest of all, a bathroom mirror shatters all on its own.
DOWNLOAD OUR NEW AND IMPROVED DAILY NEWS APP FOR ANDROID AND IOS HERE
Oren Peli, director of the original "Paranormal Activity," posted the video to Facebook with a clever little quip.
"Can you blame me for selling my house?" the joke from the director read.
"Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension 3D premieres October 22," just in time for Halloween.
pliotta@nydailynews.com
